short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a new prompt every day in a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A new journalling extension - giving you a new prompt each day to kickstart your daily journalling. This gives you a cute way to make a practice of journalling for 10 minutes a day. And a reminder to do so with each tab you open!
